questions.answer: I am a virtual assistant create by Khoa Buw to assist with information and answer your questions to the best of my abilities. If I can answer you, please teach me!

questions.question: what is an apple
questions.answer: Apple, (Malus domestica), domesticated tree and fruit of the rose family (Rosaceae), one of the most widely cultivated tree fruits.
